# Load libraries

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```
# load CSV

```{r}
Ast_data <- read.csv("Data/Linelist SENTRY site_136.csv", na.strings = c(""))
dim(Ast_data)
head(Ast_data)
```
# Extract E. coli data
```{r}
Ast_ecoli <- Ast_data %>% 
  filter(Organism.Code == "EC")


view(Ast_ecoli)

Total_ecoli <- summarise(Ast_ecoli, n())


# Drops all blank or NA columns
col_clean <- function(x) {
  return(!(all(is.na(x)) | all(x == "")))
}
Ast_ecoli_clean <- Ast_ecoli %>% 
  select_if(col_clean)
  
# Dropping unnecessary columns
Ast_ecoli_clean <- Ast_ecoli_clean %>% 
  select(
    -c(2:3, 5:10, 12:16, 58:64)
  )

view(Ast_ecoli_clean)

```
